Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ka \Ka\ prop. n. (Hinduism) An unknown god; an epithet of Prajapati and Brahma. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: ka \ka\ n. (Ancient Egyptian Religion) A spiritual aspect of the individual, living within the body during life, and surviving the body after death. It was believed to be one of two spirits inhabiting the body, the other being the {ba}, which deserts teh body at death. [PJC]
Ka n : unknown god; an epithet of Prajapati and Brahma
